doc:
Richard Farnsworth https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Farnsworth 0 Richard William Farnsworth (September 1, 1920 – October 6, 2000) was an American actor and stuntman. He is best known for his performances in The Grey Fox (1982), for which he received a Golden Globe Award nomination, Anne of Green Gables (1985), Misery (1990), and The Straight Story (1999), for which he received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actor. He died by suicide following a long battle with prostate cancer. Richard_William_Farnsworth ( September_1_,_1920 – October_6_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor_and_stuntman . He is_best_known for his_performances in The_Grey_Fox_(_1982_) , for which he received a_Golden_Globe_Award_nomination , Anne of Green_Gables ( 1985_) , Misery_(_1990_) , and The_Straight_Story_(_1999_) , for which he received a_nomination for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor . He died by suicide following a_long_battle with prostate_cancer .
